PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: System Trace Type
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Specify the type of system trace

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Probe Domain
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Select the domain of the probes to be enabled.

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: TraceAggregator_3
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Select which MCU probes to enable

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: MCU_EXPORT_SLV_0
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Transactions from wakeup and MCU domains to the MAIN domain - VBUSM

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: MCU_SRAM_SLV_1
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Transactions to the on-chip MSRAM in the MCU domain - VBUSM

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: MCU_FSS_S0_2
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Transactions to the FSS slave port 0: first OSPI and Hyperbus - VBUSM

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: MCU_FSS_S1_3
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Transactions to the second OSPI - VBUSM

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: TraceAggregator_2
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Select which SOC probes to enable

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: MAIN_CAL0_0
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Transactions issued by CAL - VBUSM

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: MAIN_DSS_2
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Transactions issued by DSS - VBUSM

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: MAIN_NAVSRAMHI_3
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Transactions from the SoC level to MSMC region with order ID range 8 to 15 - VBUSM

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: MAIN_NAVSRAMLO_4
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Transactions from the SoC level to MSMC region with order ID range 0 to 7 - VBUSM

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: MAIN_NAVDDRHI_5
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Transactions from the SoC level to DDR data region and MAIN NAVSS internal end points with order ID range 8 to 15 - VBUSM

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: MAIN_NAVDDRLO_6
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Transactions from the SoC level to DDR data region and MAIN NAVSS internal end points with order ID range 0 to 7 - VBUSM

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: TraceAggregator_0
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Select which MSMC_0 probes to enable

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: DRU0_TARGET
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Data Routing Unit 0 (DRU0) Read Probe (Target) - VBUSM.C

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: DRU0_INITIATOR
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Data Routing Unit 0 (DRU0) Initiator Probe (Initiator) - VBUSM.C

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: DRU1_TARGET
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Data Routing Unit (DRU1) Read Probe (Target) - VBUSM.C

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: DRU1_INITIATOR
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Data Routing Unit (DRU1) Initiator Probe (Initiator) - VBUSM.C

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: CSI0_TARGET
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: A53 CorePac 0 (Target) - VBUSM.C

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: CSI0_INITIATOR
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: A53 CorePac 0 (Initiator) - VBUSM.C

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: CSI2_TARGET
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: NAVSS Northbridge 1 - VBUSM.C

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: TraceAggregator_1
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Select which MSMC_1 probes to enable

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: EMIF0_INITIATOR
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: External Memory Interface (EMIF) 0 Probe (Initiator) - VBUSM.C

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: CSI1_TARGET
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: A53 CorePac 1 (Target) - VBUSM.C

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: CSI1_INITIATOR
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: A53 CorePac 1 (Initiator) - VBUSM.C

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: CSI3_TARGET
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: NAVSS Northbridge 0 - VBUSM.C

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Probe Use Case
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Select the domain of the probes to be enabled.

PROPERTY_INTEGER.NAME: Sample Window
PROPERTY_INTEGER.DESCRIPTION: Measurement interval in clock cycles for detecting statistics event (0x1000 - 0x00FFFFFF)

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: Address Range Filter
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Trace event only in the defined memory address range

PROPERTY_INTEGER.NAME: Start Address Extension
PROPERTY_INTEGER.DESCRIPTION: The 16 MSBs of an address greater than 32 bit.

PROPERTY_INTEGER.NAME: End Address Extension
PROPERTY_INTEGER.DESCRIPTION: The 16 MSBs of an address greater than 32 bit.

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: Exclusive Address
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: If false, matches will occur when transactions fall inside of the start/end range. If true, matches will occur when transactions fall outside of the start/end range.

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: Filters
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Contains filter fields for bus transactions

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: Addressing and ordering
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Bus transaction filters related to addressing and ordering.

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: Type and size
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Bus transaction filters related to type and size.

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: Priority and QoS
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Bus transaction filters related to priority and QoS (quality of service).

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: Debug
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Bus transaction filters related to debug.

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: Security
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Bus transaction filters related to security.

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: Cache and domain control
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Bus transaction filters related to cache and domain control.

PROPERTY_INTEGER.NAME: Channel ID
PROPERTY_INTEGER.DESCRIPTION: The value of the channel ID bus (0x0 - 0xFFF)

PROPERTY_INTEGER.NAME: Channel ID Mask
PROPERTY_INTEGER.DESCRIPTION: The value of the channel ID bus (0x0 - 0xFFF)

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: PABLE
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Pre-fetchable attribute per the MMU

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: PABLE Mask
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: The memory request can be pre-fetched

PROPERTY_INTEGER.NAME: CMSIDEBAND
PROPERTY_INTEGER.DESCRIPTION: The CMSIDEBAND bus mirrored sideband (0x0 - 0x3F)

PROPERTY_INTEGER.NAME: CMSIDEBAND Mask
PROPERTY_INTEGER.DESCRIPTION: The CMSIDEBAND bus mirrored sideband (0x0 - 0x3F)

PROPERTY_INTEGER.NAME: CSIDEBAND
PROPERTY_INTEGER.DESCRIPTION: The CSIDEBAND bus (0x0 - 0xFF)

PROPERTY_INTEGER.NAME: CSIDEBAND Mask
PROPERTY_INTEGER.DESCRIPTION: The CSIDEBAND bus (0x0 - 0xFF)

PROPERTY_INTEGER.NAME: Order ID
PROPERTY_INTEGER.DESCRIPTION: The extended initiator identifier used for ordering for a specific route ID (0x0 - 0xF)

PROPERTY_INTEGER.NAME: Order ID Mask
PROPERTY_INTEGER.DESCRIPTION: The extended initiator identifier used for ordering for a specific route ID (0x0 - 0xF)

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: EXCL
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: The transaction is exclusive

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: EXCL Mask
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: The transaction is exclusive

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: DIR
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: The direction of the transaction

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: DIR Mask
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: The direction of the transaction

PROPERTY_INTEGER.NAME: AMODE
PROPERTY_INTEGER.DESCRIPTION: The value of the transaction address mode (0x0 - 0x3)

PROPERTY_INTEGER.NAME: AMODE Mask
PROPERTY_INTEGER.DESCRIPTION: The value of the transaction address mode (0x0 - 0x3)

PROPERTY_INTEGER.NAME: Route ID
PROPERTY_INTEGER.DESCRIPTION: Route ID (0x0 - 0xFFF)

PROPERTY_INTEGER.NAME: Route ID Mask
PROPERTY_INTEGER.DESCRIPTION: Route ID (0x0 - 0xFFF)

PROPERTY_INTEGER.NAME: RSEL
PROPERTY_INTEGER.DESCRIPTION: The region of the transaction (0x0 - 0xF)

PROPERTY_INTEGER.NAME: RSEL Mask
PROPERTY_INTEGER.DESCRIPTION: The region of the transaction (0x0 - 0xF)

PROPERTY_INTEGER.NAME: DTYPE
PROPERTY_INTEGER.DESCRIPTION: The data type of the transaction (0x0 - 0x3)

PROPERTY_INTEGER.NAME: DTYPE Mask
PROPERTY_INTEGER.DESCRIPTION: The data type of the transaction (0x0 - 0x3)

PROPERTY_INTEGER.NAME: PRIV
PROPERTY_INTEGER.DESCRIPTION: The privilege level of the transaction (0x0 - 0x3)

PROPERTY_INTEGER.NAME: PRIV Mask
PROPERTY_INTEGER.DESCRIPTION: The privilege level of the transaction (0x0 - 0x3)

PROPERTY_INTEGER.NAME: CLSIZE
PROPERTY_INTEGER.DESCRIPTION: The burst address wrap indicator for the transaction (0x0 - 0x7)

PROPERTY_INTEGER.NAME: CLSIZE Mask
PROPERTY_INTEGER.DESCRIPTION: The burst address wrap indicator for the transaction (0x0 - 0x7)

PROPERTY_INTEGER.NAME: EPRIORITY
PROPERTY_INTEGER.DESCRIPTION: The escalated priority level of the transaction (0x0 - 0x7)

PROPERTY_INTEGER.NAME: EPRIORITY Mask
PROPERTY_INTEGER.DESCRIPTION: The escalated priority level of the transaction (0x0 - 0x7)

PROPERTY_INTEGER.NAME: PRIORITY
PROPERTY_INTEGER.DESCRIPTION: The priority level attribute of the transaction (0x0 - 0x7)

PROPERTY_INTEGER.NAME: PRIORITY Mask
PROPERTY_INTEGER.DESCRIPTION: The priority level attribute of the transaction (0x0 - 0x7)

PROPERTY_INTEGER.NAME: BYTECOUNT
PROPERTY_INTEGER.DESCRIPTION: The byte count for the transaction (0x0 - 0x3FF)

PROPERTY_INTEGER.NAME: BYTECOUNT Mask
PROPERTY_INTEGER.DESCRIPTION: The byte count for the transaction (0x0 - 0x3FF)

PROPERTY_INTEGER.NAME: OPCODE
PROPERTY_INTEGER.DESCRIPTION: The opcode of the transaction (0x0 - 0x3F)

PROPERTY_INTEGER.NAME: OPCODE Mask
PROPERTY_INTEGER.DESCRIPTION: The opcode of the transaction (0x0 - 0x3F)

PROPERTY_INTEGER.NAME: MEMTYPE
PROPERTY_INTEGER.DESCRIPTION: The memory type of the transaction (0x0 - 0x3)

PROPERTY_INTEGER.NAME: MEMTYPE Mask
PROPERTY_INTEGER.DESCRIPTION: The memory type of the transaction (0x0 - 0x3)

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: SECURE
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: The transaction is secure

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: SECURE Mask
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: The transaction is secure

PROPERTY_INTEGER.NAME: QOS
PROPERTY_INTEGER.DESCRIPTION: The QoS (quality of service) of the transaction (0x0 - 0x7)

PROPERTY_INTEGER.NAME: QOS Mask
PROPERTY_INTEGER.DESCRIPTION: The QOS (quality of service) of the transaction (0x0 - 0x7)

PROPERTY_INTEGER.NAME: SDOMAIN
PROPERTY_INTEGER.DESCRIPTION: Inner, outer and non shared shareability domain of the transaction (0x0 - 0x3)

PROPERTY_INTEGER.NAME: SDOMAIN Mask
PROPERTY_INTEGER.DESCRIPTION: Inner, outer and non shared shareability domain of the transaction (0x0 - 0x3)

PROPERTY_INTEGER.NAME: OUTER
PROPERTY_INTEGER.DESCRIPTION: Transaction for outer cache domain (0x0 - 0x3)

PROPERTY_INTEGER.NAME: OUTER Mask
PROPERTY_INTEGER.DESCRIPTION: Transaction for outer cache domain (0x0 - 0x3)

PROPERTY_INTEGER.NAME: INNER
PROPERTY_INTEGER.DESCRIPTION: Transaction for inner cache domain (0x0 - 0x3)

PROPERTY_INTEGER.NAME: INNER Mask
PROPERTY_INTEGER.DESCRIPTION: Transaction for inner cache domain (0x0 - 0x3)

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: EMUDBG
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Transaction initiated by debug

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: EMUDBG Mask
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Transaction initiated by debug

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: INTEREST
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Interest bit (debug marker) qualifier of the transaction

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: INTEREST Mask
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Interest bit (debug marker) qualifier of the transaction

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: FLUSH
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: signal to slave ignore invalid transaction

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: FLUSH Mask
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: signal to slave ignore invalid transaction

PROPERTY_INTEGER.NAME: FWPASS
PROPERTY_INTEGER.DESCRIPTION: firewall pass status (0x0 - 0x3)

PROPERTY_INTEGER.NAME: FWPASS Mask
PROPERTY_INTEGER.DESCRIPTION: firewall pass status (0x0 - 0x3)

PROPERTY_INTEGER.NAME: ASEL
PROPERTY_INTEGER.DESCRIPTION: Destination/slave select index (0x0 - 0xF)

PROPERTY_INTEGER.NAME: ASEL Mask
PROPERTY_INTEGER.DESCRIPTION: Destination/slave select index (0x0 - 0xF)

PROPERTY_INTEGER.NAME: ATYPE
PROPERTY_INTEGER.DESCRIPTION: The address type designation for the transaction (0x0 - 0x3)

PROPERTY_INTEGER.NAME: ATYPE Mask
PROPERTY_INTEGER.DESCRIPTION: The address type designation for the transaction (0x0 - 0x3)

PROPERTY_INTEGER.NAME: PRIVID
PROPERTY_INTEGER.DESCRIPTION: The (secure) privilege ID of the transaction (0x0 - 0x0FF)

PROPERTY_INTEGER.NAME: PRIVID Mask
PROPERTY_INTEGER.DESCRIPTION: The (secure) privilege ID of the transaction (0x0 - 0x0FF)

PROPERTY_INTEGER.NAME: VIRTID
PROPERTY_INTEGER.DESCRIPTION: The virtual master ID for the transaction (0x0 - 0xFFF)

PROPERTY_INTEGER.NAME: VIRTID Mask
PROPERTY_INTEGER.DESCRIPTION: The virtual master ID for the transaction (0x0 - 0xFFF)

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: NavSS Select
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Select the ring accelerator trace to be enabled.

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: Debugger Enabled Trace
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: If true, the debugger will program the RA GCFG registers, aggregator, and trace sink. If false, the debugger will only program the aggregator and trace sink.

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: All Queues
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: If true, all queues will be traced. If false, only selected queue will be traced.

PROPERTY_INTEGER.NAME: Queue number
PROPERTY_INTEGER.DESCRIPTION: Specify the queue number to trace (0 - 1024)

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: Message Data
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: If true, message data will be traced. If false, only the operation will be traced.

PROPERTY_INTEGER.NAME: Overflow Queue
PROPERTY_INTEGER.DESCRIPTION: Specify the queue number to send overflow messages to (0 - 1024)

PROPERTY_INTEGER.NAME: Event ID
PROPERTY_INTEGER.DESCRIPTION: Specify the event ID to send when detecting a bus error (0 - 65535)

PROPERTY_INTEGER.NAME: Clock Rate(Mhz)
PROPERTY_INTEGER.DESCRIPTION: The clock rate for converting clock cycles to seconds

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: Suppress Zeros
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Suppress zeros data values in decoded trace data.

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Sync Core Halt
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Sync trace halt capture to a core

PROPERTY_INTEGER.NAME: MCU Probe Bus Clock
PROPERTY_INTEGER.DESCRIPTION: Clock rate of MCU bus probes in MHz. Calculated from MCU_SYSCLK0 / 2.

PROPERTY_INTEGER.NAME: SOC Probe Bus Clock
PROPERTY_INTEGER.DESCRIPTION: Clock rate of SOC bus probes in MHz. Calculated from MAIN_SYSCLK0 / 2.

PROPERTY_INTEGER.NAME: MSMC Probe Bus Clock
PROPERTY_INTEGER.DESCRIPTION: Clock rate of aggregator in MHz. Calculated from MAIN_SYSCLK0.

PROPERTY_INTEGER.NAME: MSMC Probe Bus Clock
PROPERTY_INTEGER.DESCRIPTION: Clock rate of aggregator in MHz. Calculated from MAIN_SYSCLK0
